title: Body
cleaned_text: Natural Healing Centers Natural Healing Centers Integrative Health & Spa Phone: 708-468-8561 Email: Massage Pam Montalbano, Massage Therapist, Cranial Sacral Therapist, Reiki Master My intention as a Massage Therapist is to bring relaxation, restore energy, relieve pain and support the body's natural healing process. I focus on the spiritual aspects of massage allowing my intuition to guide me through each session. I create a sacred healing space where the body and spirit can communicate what it needs. I am trained in several modalities including Swedish, Deep Tissue, Esalen, Lymphatic, Thai Massage, Prenatal, Oncology Massage, Cranial Sacral and Reiki. Each session is tailored to the client's specific needs. I pull from each of these modalities to create a unique healing experience. I may combine relaxation, deep tissue, stretching and energy work all within one session. My technique includes using long flowing deep strokes, deep enough to allow healing but gentle enough to allow the client to remain relaxed. Massage therapy brings relaxation, restores energy, relieves pain and supports the body's natural healing process. Pam offers: Customized Therapeutic Massage: This massage is customized to your specific needs. We can include Swedish Massage techniques for relaxation or deep tissue work and stretching to help alleviate specific problems or pains. We can also include energy work into your massage for the complete mind, body and spirit healing. Each session is customized for you. 1 hour: $100 1 ½ hour: $145 Prenatal Massage: Pregnancy is a very special time. Extra care is taken with moms to be to provide a comfortable position. Once fully supported, we can begin to relieve muscle tension, fatigue, swelling and any other concerns. While totally relaxed, we can start to shift any lingering emotions related to pregnancy, birth and caring for a newborn. Tending to these concerns and physical discomforts will allow for a more enjoyable pregnancy, ease labor and delivery and improve postnatal recovery. 1 hour: $100 1 ½ hour: gentle massage that stimulates the lymphatic system. The function of the lymphatic system is to carry waste, toxins, unwanted materials and excess water from the body. Through Lymphatic Massage, we can help stimulate the body's natural cleaning system, promoting a healthier immune system and a healthier state of being. 1 hour: $100 1 ½ hour: $145 Reiki Massage: There is a physical, emotional and spiritual balance within our bodies. When one of these areas is under stress, it can create physical symptoms within us. Reiki Massage is a full body massage which focuses on loving healing energy flowing through you. This healing energy restores harmony and balance within our bodies. We will create a space where you can relax, let go, breathe and heal. 1 hour: $100 1 ½ hour: $145 Cranial Sacral Therapy: This is a gentle therapy using a specific method of touch and intention and begins by focusing on the bodies central nervous system. Our central nervous system (brain and spinal cord) has a great influence over the body's ability to function properly. Stress and lingering emotions cause tension and restrictions within this system. These restrictions can create an emotional, spiritual and physical imbalance resulting in pain and other dysfunctions. Through this therapy, we will focus on expanding and releasing any restrictions within the central nervous system and throughout our physical and energetic bodies. Cranial Sacral Therapy allows healing on a physical, emotional and soul level and restores balance and harmony to all of our systems. Cranial Sacral is not a massage but can be added into any massage service. 1 hour: $100 1 ½ hour: $145 Sara Musial, Massage Therapist Massage and therapeutic bodywork is for everyone! Need an evening or weekend appointment? Sara is here for you. She is a clinically trained licensed massage therapist with a background in mental health counseling. She has over 9 years massage experience with the last 3 years spent studying and practicing energy work. If you are wanting to increase general well-being, decrease stress, heal from chronic pain, illness or emotional suffering schedule a session with Sara. She will use intuition to offer a nurturing session designed especially for you and use intention to create a safe space for you to let go. Sara offers: Sacred Journey Massage: This is a full body spiritual experience. This massage can take you on a deep inner journey towards your higher self. When we are able to connect with our higher self, we then connect with love, wisdom and true healing. This massage will focus on relaxing our physical bodies, raising our energetic vibration, and opening and releasing energetic restrictions. Our intention during this massage is to create a space where you can relax, quiet your mind and enjoy the sacred journey of this massage. 1 ½ hour: $145 Cranial Sacral Therapy: There is an energetic vibrational field within and around our bodies. By using intention and connecting to our higher self, we can raise this vibration and restore balance and harmony to our energy system. Through this therapy, we will also focus on expanding and releasing any restrictions we are holding in our bodies. This is not a Massage. This is a gentle therapy using touch, connection and intention. During the session, most clients feel an overall sense of relaxation and quieting of the mind. Cranial Sacral Therapy allows healing on a physical, emotional and soul level. 1 hour: $100 1 ½ hour: $145 Hot Stone Massage: During this deeply relaxing treatment, Sara will use naturally healing heated basalt stones. These stones will be placed on the body and used an as extension of her hands to deliver traditional therapeutic massage techniques. The heat softens muscle tissue providing access to deeper work with less pressure. Great for relieving: muscle tension, chronic pain, insomnia, stress and more! 1 $100 1 ½ hour: $145 Monica Ruane, Aromatherapist, Reflexologist, Reiki Practitioner Aromatherapy is defined as the art and science of utilizing naturally extracted aromatic essences from plants to balance, harmonize and promote the health of body, mind and spirit. On a deeper level, essential oils are the "spirits" of plants, trees, flowers, seeds and resins. Essential oils are the original "medicine" of our ancestors and they heal on emotional, spiritual, mental and physical levels. Monica connects with the spirits of the essential oils and intuitively uses them to heal others. As a certified Aromatherapist, Monica is able to create custom oil blends for her clients that promote well-being within the delicate balance of body, mind and spirit. The Plant Kingdom offers a vast array of options for situations ranging from medical conditions, to maintaining wellness, to expanding one's intuitive and spiritual experiences. For some, the magnitude and diversity of these options is a bit overwhelming, and they need some assistance in determining which essences are best for their needs and interests. Monica offers: Aromatherapy: Aromatherapy is defined as the inhalation or bodily application of fragrant essential oils for therapeutic purposes. As a certified Aromatherapist, Monica is able to create custom oil blends for her clients to support physical, mental and spiritual health. Personal Aromatherapy Consultation (One-on- One In Person or by Phone) 15 minute consultation: $25 (includes a custom $10-$35 Reflexology: Reflexology stimulates nerve function, increases energy, boosts circulation, induces a deep state of relaxation, and eliminates toxins from the body. Sessions include hot towel wraps before and after treatment. Pair it with the detox & energize treatment to boost the detoxification process even more! 45 minutes: $75 1 hour: $90 Add on Reiki Mediumship: $25 30 minutes to detox only) $55 Detox & Energize Treatment: Detoxification is one of the most effective methods to eliminate toxic substances that build up throughout our system. A high toxin load may cause skin problems, frequent or recurring colds, chronic pains, low energy levels, allergies and other illnesses. Medi-body mud mask and mud bath is a detox therapy that draws toxins out of the body. Detoxing your body via the feet is considered to be one of the safest forms of detoxification. 1st Visit (30 minutes): $65 Follow Up Visits (30 minutes): $45 Add on to Reflexology: $35 Jade Stone Reflexology I wanted to share the wonderful healing powers of green Jade. Jade is known to transfer your negative energy into positive energy. It's a wonderful healing stone. The Jade stone I use has been crafted into a reflexology tool I use to press and massage specific healing points on the feet. Based on traditional Chinese medicine, the energy of chi flows remarkably well through the Jade stone. Service includes complementary flower essence infused water, so you can sip while you soak your feet at the beginning of your session. Fields of Flowers formula, a homeopathic formula, is a unique combination of the 38 traditional flower essences with each one long associated with a key element of emotional concern. 45 minute session: $75 60 minute session: $90 AromaTouch Technique The AromaTouch Technique is a clinical apporoach to applying essential oils along energy meridians and visceral contact points of the back and feet to help stimulate and balance sympathetic and para-sympathetic nervous systems of the body. The AromaTouch technique improves well-being by reducing physical and emotional stressors and by supporting healthy autonomic function.This service is not a massage and does not include any muscle tissue manipulation. Specific essential oils are applied with a gentle touch in a way to help you not only enjoy all the benefits of the essential oils themselves but also a soothing experience that leaves you refreshed, relaxed and energized all at the same time! Benefits of AromaTouch May Include: improved blood flow and oxygen levels better distribution of oil to tissue reduction in stress levels boost in immune system function relaxation reduction in inflammation elevated mood detoxification AromaTouch Pricing 45-minute session: $65 Add on on 30 min foot reflexology: $45 Detoxification Detoxification The body is constantly trying to eliminate toxins caused by our foods, our environment and by-products of our daily bodily functions. Due to our stressful lifestyles, our bodies can always use help with detoxification. Eating leafy greens and cruciferous vegetables helps your liver to detox but there are more organs involved in detoxification and elimination of toxins in the body. We offer many different modalities to assist with detoxification. OmniCleanse Comprehensive Detox Kit by DesBio A comprehensive homeopathic kit used to relieve symptoms related to blockage of drainage pathways in the body. It includes 6 homeopathic remedies to aid the liver, gallbladder, urinary bladder, skin, tissue, brain and lymphatic system in detoxification. The detox kit is recommended once a year but highly recommended before any diet program is started as most toxins are stored in fatty tissue and released into the system when weight loss occurs. Kit includes 6 remedies. OmniCleanse Shake and Detox herbal capsules...$199 Ionic Foot Bath An ionic foot bath is a natural method of assisting the body in eliminating harmful toxins, heavy metals, and other harmful foreign matter. Electrical current passes through a set of plates in a module that is immersed in the water of a foot bath tub. The water contains sea salt and has the concentration of water from the ocean. Positive and negative ions are emitted re-energizing the body and the red blood cells. Toxins stored in the fat, kidneys, liver, bowel and skin are eliminated. It also triggers the body's lymphatic system which helps with detoxification 24-48 hours after the treatment. 30 minutes...$35 60 minutes...$45 Detox and Energize Treatment Detoxification is one of the most effective methods to eliminate toxic substances that build up throughout our system. A high toxin load may cause skin problems, frequent or recurring colds, chronic pains, low energy levels, allergies and other illnesses. Medi-Body mud mask andbath is a detox therapy that draws toxins out of the body. Detoxing your body via the feet is considered to be one of the safest forms of detoxification. 1st visit (30 minutes)...$65 Follow up visits (30 minutes)...$45 Add-on to Reflexology...$35 Chi Machine- Lymphatic Detox In just 15 minutes, the Chi Machine gives the body the equivalent of 1 1/2 hours of walking. The movement relaxes the nerves and muscles, improves energy flow, as well as relieving tension in the back, neck and shoulders. It is used to improve circulation of blood flow and the lymphatic system. 15 minutes...$25 Yoga Carrie Pokorney, Reiki Master, Yoga Facilitator Carrie is an Usui Reiki Master and Karuna Practitioner and is currently studying herbalism to assist her family and clients. She is also a yoga teacher and specializes in prenatal and postpartum yoga. She loves to empower & support others through a variety of healing modalities. Her sessions and classes guide clients toward building a strong sense of self rooted in compassion and self-love. Energy work has been a constant companion through each shift, journey, and lesson Carrie has been through. From the darkest times of the postpartum season, to assisting her after therapy, while using Western medicines, through anxiety attacks, and holding her while lost in deep fear, energy work has brought her light and Divine support. Carrie believes energy work cleanses the field within us that feels heavy and guides us towards our true light. Her soul's purpose is to "unlearn" - to move back to the light and guide others to their peace and freedom. Carrie Offers: Elemental Energy Flow Healing Session: Immerse your energetic body in nature through this individual 60 minute elemental energy flow healing session. Carrie uses the five elements to heal, move, and cleanse any "stuck" energies you may have leading to clarity and lightness. There will be 3-4 restorative yoga postures and mudras to assist in grounding the physical body and, when needed, crystals, aromatherapy, and herbalism to bring balance to the earth element. Working with the element of air, Carrie uses guided meditation to anchor wandering thoughts and sound healing to slow down overactive brain waves. Breath work or pranayama is used to ignite inner fire and awaken the Spirit. We will enter the Ether by opening the Akashic records and target specific areas that need focus. Finally, Carrie taps into the power of water - the final cleansing of Reiki and intuitive findings. Carrie will send a follow up email with detailed findings & herb recommendations within 48 hours of the session. 60 minutes: $90 Yoga & Reiki Group Classes: Carrie combines a gentle, introspective practice with energy healing to create space in body, mind, and soul. Reiki is a Japanese hands-on healing modality that transmits through a practitioner's hands to the receiver. Slow yoga and Reiki both promote relaxation, stress relief, and create balance within the body. We will begin with gentle stretches, twists, and movements followed by 30 minutes of restorative postures and generous doses of Reiki. Come as you are (with extra comfortable clothes). Leave lighter, balanced, and restored. In this month's class, Carrie will include restorative yoga, aromatherapy, and journaling. 90 minute class: $35 Sound Therapy & Facials Danna Goddard, Licensed Esthetician, Certified Sound Therapist, Reiki Master Danna Goddard is a Licensed Esthetician from Pivot Point International Academy, and a Certified Sound Therapist and Reiki Master from Harmonic Waves Healing. Her approach to skin care is about holistic wellbeing. She believes in a natural approach to skin care and maintenance through hydrating, anti-aging skin care products and facial massage that lifts and tones skin and muscle. Danna's sessions use the Universal Life Energy of Reiki, in combination with the frequencies and tone of a variety of acoustic instruments. The energy and vibrations work by massaging every cell in the body working its way through the skin, muscle, tissue and organs promoting overall healing. Essential oils and chakra crystals may be incorporated into individualized sessions making each a full mind, body and soul treatment. Danna Offers: Individual Sound Therapy Sessions: Sound frequency is the base and foundation of all creation, connection, being and living. Sound is frequency and vibration that makes up our entire existence. Everything physical has a resonance that also resonates with sounds around us therefore the sounds we hear impact our mind, body and soul. Think of this 60 minute treatment as a "massage for your soul". You'll be bathed in soothing sounds of singing bowls, gongs, chimes, bells, maracas and drums. Each instrument has a different tone and frequency that specifically target different areas and chakras in the body. This treatment can help release tension and reduce stress and chronic pain. It will help to relax and focus the mind, release fatigue and tension. You will leave this session having gone on an inward journey of the mind and senses. 60 Minutes: $120 Reiki and Sound Therapy Session: "Quiet your mind and you enter into direct communication with your soul." This specialized 60 minute treatment uses the universal healing energy of Reiki and combines it with the vibrational healing of sound therapy. Using chakra crystals and Reiki healing on energy points, Danna can identify blocked energy centers in the body and help to release them, grounding your mind and body and soothing your soul. All this while being bathed in soothing sounds of singing bowls, gongs, chimes, bells, maracas and drums. Each instrument has a different tone and frequency that specifically targets different areas and chakras in the body. Some will break-up stagnant energy and help reduce stress and chronic pain. Others help to relax and focus the mind, release fatigue and tension. The combination of these two powerful healing treatments will leave you feeling physically and emotionally balanced. 60 Minutes: $120 Healing Energy Skin Therapy Facial: A completely unique facial treatment unlike any other. This 60 minute skin care session incorporates not only the aspects of a classic facial but uses Reiki healing and sound therapy to make it a full body and soul experience. Restoring radiance, leaving your skin glowing and your mind, body and soul relaxed. A deep cleanse, exfoliation, a hydrating mask, and facial massage are only the beginning. This treatment incorporates Reiki healing using the universal energy and chakra crystals placed on energy points to help ground you and soothe your soul. Sound therapy vibrations through the use of different healing instruments help to break-up stagnant energy and realign it in your body. This specialized treatment will leave you luminous inside and out. 60 Minutes: $145 Refresh and Relax Facial: This 60 minute skin care session incorporates the aspects of a classic facial. It helps to restore radiance and leaves your skin glowing. This treatment will include a deep cleanse, exfoliation, a hydrating mask, and facial massage. 60 Minutes: $100 Our mission at Natural Healing Centers is to encourage healing on all levels, being able to reach one's highest potential within the sacred structure containing body, mind and spirit. Natural Healing Centers offers holistic or alternative forms of health care which means we treat all aspects of disease or discomfort. We treat more than just the physical symptoms. We pay attention to the emotional and spiritual issues as well. Natural Healing Centers acknowledges that the body has the best means to heal and the most knowledge about any ailments or pains we are experiencing. Our goal is to support the body and encourage healing. We offer a variety of services and are happy to assist you in finding the therapy that would be best for you. Contact Us Ronica Perez, MSAc, LAc We accept insurance!! Call us and we will check if you are qualified Address: 16646 Oak Park
